alert.note: Alert for Craven; Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 09 at 8:03PM EST until January 09 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... North central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EST. * At 803 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Tuscarora, or 9 miles northwest of New Bern, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Vanceboro and Ernul around 810 PM EST. Wilmar around 815 PM EST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
